name: 5/3/1 – 5s Pro Variation
time_per_session_breakdown: 3 sets ~5 reps each, plus optional supplemental
overview_and_execution: Each main set is exactly 5 reps at 65, 75, 85% (Week1), 70, 80, 90% (Week2), 75, 85, 95% (Week3). But you only do 5 reps, no AMRAP. Deload in week4, then increase TM.
example_application: Week1 Squat: 65%×5, 75%×5, 85%×5 (no extra reps). Next weeks: +5-10% each wave.
important_notes: Highly submaximal, focusing on form and volume consistency. Usually paired with deeper volume work (e.g. Boring But Big).
volume_metrics: 3 sets x 5 reps = 15 reps per main lift
